title: Mary Berry's hot cross buns
description: Bring the flavours of Easter to your kitchen with Mary's moreish hot cross buns.For this recipe you will need a piping bag fitted witha  fine 3mm nozzle, but if you don't have a nozzle you could use a piping bag and snip the end off.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
